dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Nope I haven’t, why do you ask?

dialogue.name: Chuuni
dialogue.dialogueText: H-How can you just walk around like that!?

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Chuuni won’t take her eyes away from her face.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Quite easily. You just don’t put “it” away...

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Chuuni let out a low whining growl like a defeated beast before I felt bad enough that I told her she could look again.

dialogue.name: Chuuni
dialogue.dialogueText: That was mean Takeshi-Kun! How can you tease a girl like that!?
